questions.question: Does this checkpoint outline capture the right flow? I've structured it as vertical slices where CP1 gives you a complete (if minimal) talk, and each subsequent checkpoint adds depth.

options.label: Approve outline
options.description: This captures the flow well. Let's proceed to detailing Checkpoint 1.

options.label: Adjust checkpoints
options.description: The overall structure is off - let me explain what needs to change.

options.label: Merge some checkpoints
options.description: 6 checkpoints feels like too many for this project - combine some.

questions.question: Does this task group breakdown for Checkpoint 1 make sense? The flow is: Title → Problem → About Me (with hook) → Solution Intro → Clean up file structure.

options.label: Approve task groups
options.description: This breakdown captures the work needed. Let's detail the tasks.

options.label: Adjust grouping
options.description: The grouping could be better - let me suggest changes.

options.label: Merge groups
options.description: Some of these could be combined into fewer groups.
